verbs.description: [ARG0: China ’s government] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Friday] [ARG1: it will retaliate for President Donald Trump ’s tariff hike on Chinese goods]
China ’s government said Friday it [V: will] retaliate for President Donald Trump ’s tariff hike on Chinese goods
China ’s government said Friday [ARG0: it] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: retaliate] [ARG1: for President Donald Trump ’s tariff hike on Chinese goods]
